nodes.text: Ingo Squadron was a Squadron of Z-95 Headhunters employed by the Dimok Government's Navy. During the final stages of the Sepan Civil War Imperial forces lead by Admiral Harkov were to receive TIE Avengers from the Escort carrier Tropsobor. During that time both Ripoblus and Dimok forces had joined forces to attack Harkov while he was receiving his new fighters. The attack was repelled, thanks to Maarek Stele and Ingo Squadron was likely destroyed in the conflict.
